alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 3:27AM CST until February 16 at 4:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Fulton County in north central Arkansas... Central Sharp County in north central Arkansas... * Until 415 AM CST. * At 327 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Byron, or near Salem in Fulton County, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cherokee Village... Salem in Fulton County... Mammoth Spring... Hardy... Viola... Bexar... Byron... Flint Springs... Mammoth Spring State Park... Heart... Fryatt... Saddler Falls... Wheeling... Saddle... Salem Airport... Camp... Glencoe... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for north central Arkansas.
